fullText:
Shadowborn

Paragon Tier
Prerequisite: 11th level, drow
Benefit: Whenever you start an encounter in an area of darkness or dim illumination, you gain a +2 bonus to your initiative check and, until the second round of combat, a +1 feat bonus to damage rolls against any creature you have combat advantage against.

Published in Dragon Magazine 367, page(s) 38.
name: Shadowborn
